1.content: Driving home from work someone cuts you off forcing you onto the rumble strip and then onto the grass you are forced to slam on your breaks hard to avoid hitting a mile marker.
1.title: It begins

choices: Good Bring the card inside
Bad Use the card Fill Up your  Tank and keep it
11.content:
You honk your horn.Your mad but see no good coming from a interaction.
You pull off the highway and into a gas station. You see a platinum credit card sitting on top of the pump. When you flip it over you see that the pin has been written on the back
11.title: Good honk your horn and drop back letting it go

choices: Good Walk back inside and tell the person
Bad It was just a small tap they probally won't even notice
111.content:
You bring the card inside and prepay a pump using cash.
After you fill up you start to back your car up and tap the car behind you
The person is inside and didn't see you hit the car.
111.title: Good Bring the card inside

choices: Good: Walk away
Bad: Yell Back
1111.content: The person yells at you for scratching their car.
1111.title: Good Walk back inside and tell the person

choices: Good: Turn the other cheek-maybe talk it out.
Bad: Attack the person-make them suffer.
11111.content: The person smacks you on the head, and you stumble onto the ground. The person is not yet satisfied with the outcome.
11111.title: Good: Walk away

choices: Good: Continue home and relax after a stressful day
Bad: Visit the nearest Auto Teller Machine for the maximum cash advance value.
112.content:
It's unlikely that the number on the back even really IS the pin, but you try it, and you end up with a free tank of gas.
As soon as the owner realizes it's missing, it's sure to be cancelled, but how far out of your way do you go to take full advantage of it before then?
112.title: Bad Use the card Fill Up your  Tank and keep it

choices: Good Slow down
Bad Accelerate
12.content: Approaching on their car rather fast you realize that you are going to hit them hard
12.title: Bad accelerate and give there bumper a little tap

choices: Good Call an ambulance
Bad Screw them they almost hit me and they didn’t slow down
122.content: You hit them and they fishtail before going off the road and stopping abruptly after hitting a mound of dirt. There is no damage to your car. You can see them moving
122.title: Bad Accelerate

choices: Good Politely ask them what’s going on
Bad Deal with it in your own way
1222.content: You arrive at your house and realize that your neighbor has had a couple buddies over and they have decided to swim in your pool leaving there open and empty beer cans littered throughout your back yard
1222.title: Bad Screw them they almost hit me and they didn...

choices: Good:  Ask for Help
Bad: Point the shotgun at him
12222.content: You take a shotgun and storm round to your neighbour's front door. As you ascend the steps, you trip and shoot yourself in the foot. You scream, and the neighbour answers the door attracted by the noise.
12222.title: Bad Deal with it in your own way

info.brief_description: A fun interactive to do when you have had a bad day or want to feel better about yourself
info.description:
Real simple concept here do you do the good thing or the bad thing. The interactive is set in 1st person (You referring to yourself not him or her unless you’re talking about someone else). Try to keep the chapters less than 5 sentenceds. But if you go over no big.
Don’t kill the main character. Anything else is allowed!!! Switch it up also. Lots of twist and turns try to make them make sense and flow into each other.
One more little rule when you give a choice please put it in good bad format
I.e. you see the stranger in front of you drop a $20
Good Tell them they dropped it
Bad Grab the cash
Have Fun.
